text: Ate uha sahira vica ajihe samem dakhila ho'i'a jadom sahira vasi beparavaha sana tam usa ne ute do badi'a nu larade ho'e vekhi'a. Ika usa di apani kauma vicom ate dusara dusamanam vicom si. Tam jihara usa di kauma vicom si usa ne apane dusamana de virudha madada magi. Tam musa ne usa nu muka mari'a ate usa da kama tamama kara dita. Musa ne akhi'a ki iha saitana de kamam vicom' hai, besaka uha bhataka'una vala paka dusamana hai
